text:
Me to Client: You owe $3k due to your employer withholding 4% of income. 
Client: Well FML... Let's brainstorm. I'll get you the daycare that I first told you we didn't have....
Me to self.... FML I'm going to bed. 
@Taxtwitter
How popular is Intuit's Lacerte for tax prep in the @taxtwitter world?
@taxtwitter anyone have a good resource for which states accept 1065 federal extension and which do not?
Hey @taxtwitter i started a new accounting position this week with a new firm. Any thoughts on self-review help for a new senior?

hey @taxtwitter, I got a query fr/a reader who's tax preparer won't file 8915-E for her; the tax person says the code should be 2, not 1, but the issuer says it can't change it; the distribution as a COVID disaster withdrawal is to be made on 8015. Should she file it herself?
